name: Wind and Freedom
description:
In this Round, when an opposing character is defeated during your Action, you can continue to act again when that Action ends.
Usage(s)：1
(You must have at least 2 Mondstadt characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>In this Round, when an opposing character is defeated during your Action</color>, you can continue to act again when that Action ends.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]：1</color>\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#3401}Mondstadt characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>In this Round, when an opposing character is defeated during your Action</color>, you can continue to act again when that Action ends.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>：1</color>\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#3401}Mondstadt characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: "Someday, the winds will blow towards a brighter future."
